name: SecureCare Technologies,
tag_list: fax-services, secure-faxing, fax-automation, faxing-compliance, internet-fax, fax-to-email, secure-fax, hipaa-compliant-fax, sox-compliance, sox-compliant-fax, glb-compliance, glb-compliant-fax
overview: SecureCare has used smart technology to create Sfax, which enables the secure and automated processing, exchange and management of sensitive documents and data. Sfax uses smart technology to remove the entire manual faxing process with a complete audit trail to save users both time and money. Sfax is used by thousands of customers across banking, financial services, insurance, healthcare sector and logistics sectors who rely on Sfax every day to ensure regulatory compliance.
